name: lovclip
description: A modern clipboard manager with Alfred-like interface for neurora.
author: neurora

scripts.build: pnpm run build:native && tsc && vite build && electron-builder --publish=always
scripts.postinstall: node -e "if(!process.env.CI) { try { require('child_process').execSync('electron-builder install-app-deps', {stdio: 'inherit'}); } catch(e) { console.log('Skipping electron-builder install-app-deps:', e.message); } }"
scripts.dist: pnpm run build:native && tsc && vite build && electron-builder --publish=never
scripts.dist:ci: pnpm run build:native && tsc && vite build && electron-builder --publish=never --config electron-builder.ci.json
scripts.dist:mac: pnpm run build:native && tsc && vite build && electron-builder --mac --publish=never
scripts.dist:win: pnpm run build:native && tsc && vite build && electron-builder --win --publish=never
scripts.dist:linux: pnpm run build:native && tsc && vite build && electron-builder --linux --publish=never
